value.title: Explore data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Turn your business intelligence data into data insights by creating and configuring Power BI dashboards.

value.title: Add a little info to your Sparkline in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you checked out sparklines in Power BI? Patrick explores how to set them up and also how you can be creative with them to add additional context to your reports!  KPI Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zHzSBNES6jE  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: Deployment Pipelines give you more CONTROL (Power BI Premium)
value.excerpt: With Deployment Pipelines, you can control your application life cycle stages. Keep content in sync at the different stages of your development. Power BI Premium is required. value.title: Power BI Tutorial | From Flat File To Data Model

value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube

topItems.title: How to Use CALCULATE in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This is one of the most import function to master in Power BI. You can filter your data and create complex measure such as year over year comparisons with ease with these easy to follow tutorial. More more help this function.

topItems.title: Computing a measure in DAX Studio
topItems.excerpt: You can use DAX Studio to evaluate one or more measures in your data model. This is the first step to write, test, and debug your DAX measures in a productive manner.  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/

value.title: Explore what Power BI can do for you
value.excerpt: As a consumer, you'll work in the Power BI service to review and interact with content that has been shared with you. This module provides the foundational information that you need to work effectively in the Power BI service.

value.title: Model data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Connect Power BI to multiple data sources to create reports. Define the relationship between your data sources.

value.title: Publish and share in Power BI
value.excerpt: Publish and share your Power BI reports and dashboards to teammates in your organization or to everyone on the web.

value.title: DAX Fridays! #78: When should I use FILTER() with CALCULATE?
value.excerpt: When should you use the filter function with CALCULATE?  As you probably have noticed, sometimes people use a column in the filter part of CALCULATE and sometimes they use the FILTER function.  The question is, when should you use what?  In this video I will try to clarify that question.  Dont miss part

value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.  Chris Cook - @Finalyst89  Scott Senkeresty – @ScottSenkeresty  Dynamically changing chart axis http://tinylizard.com/dynamically-changing-chart-axis/
